name: Verify "Apply" button functionality for Vehicle designer job -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I am on the Career landing page
When I click on the dropdown and select "Hardware Department"
Then I should see job items listed under the "Hardware Department"
And I click the Apply button for the "Vehicle designer" job
Then I should see a new page for filling job application details

fullName: TC_22 - Check "Apply" button functionality for Vehicle designer job in Hardware Department: Verify "Apply" button functionality for Vehicle designer job

labels.value: TC_22 - Check "Apply" button functionality for Vehicle designer job in Hardware Department
